overview: Joe White serves as the companyâ€™s Vice President of Sales and Service, responsible for driving all sales and service programs and strategies for Market Leader. White has over 20 years of experience and success in sales, operations and service roles, and before joining Market Leader served as President of Forensics Consulting Services, a services and software company in the legal industry. Prior to that, White served as Executive Vice President of Sales at Attenex Inc., where he grew the software start-up from $700K to over $27M during his four years with the company. His experience also includes executive roles at Aventail Corporation, a network communications company; Innuity, a website development company targeting small to medium sized businesses; and Mosaix, Inc., a publicly-traded telecommunications software company. White holds a BS degree in communications management from the University of Portland, and an MBA degree from Harvard Business School.
